description.displayText: Amanda is an incredibly dedicated and hard worker.  She is a true gem and a diamond in the rough.  She goes above and beyond your expectations always giving 110%.  I would trust her with my life and the life of my children.  Any employer you be very lucky to have Amanda as an employee.
description.originalText: Amanda is an incredibly dedicated and hard worker.  She is a true gem and a diamond in the rough.  She goes above and beyond your expectations always giving 110%.  I would trust her with my life and the life of my children.  Any employer you be very lucky to have Amanda as an employee.

description.displayText: Amanda- Is a great person! In the last 3 yrs that my little boy  had her, I never had a doubt or uneasiness. She is genuine and has a great big heart for children.
description.originalText: Amanda- Is a great person! In the last 3 yrs that my little boy  had her, I never had a doubt or uneasiness. She is genuine and has a great big heart for children.

description.displayText: Amanda is a very professional and intelligent young woman. Over the years that I have known her, I have seen her work with a variety of age groups in our center.  Not only can she adapt her teaching style to accommodate different ages, but the children always feel comfortable around her because of her warm presence. Amanda was responsible for a number of duties including lesson planning, classroom management, and was even selected by her peers to be the teacher liaison when the center hired a new Executive Director.  Due to her flexible teaching style and wonderful demeanor, I highly recommend Amanda for any position!

description.displayText: Amanda H. was an excellent employee.  She demonstrated the ability to follow guidelines, accept constructive feedback, and--most importantly--she was a wonderful caregiver and teacher to the young children she served.  She is a quick study and recognizes that quality care and building relationships is the foundation for success.
